attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It's time to cut our losses and scrap this gross and unaffordable extravagance.

London doesn't need its transport network disrupted by the demands of Olympic events.

The roads are bad enough without taking our large areas for Olympic lanes.

The Olympics have become overblown with too many meaningless sports.

London does not need another legacy millstone of debt.

Just pull out now and save London from this madness.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
